Description.Text: The Vasari Vacation Resort is located on the exclusive Alzambra-Vasari urbanization, in the very heart of the Costa del Sol. The resort lies within 2km of Puerto Banus marina and beach, where guests will find some of the most varied cuisine and shops, and 7km from the popular tourist destination of Marbella. The resort buildings have been designed in harmony with the Andalucia landscape, and luxury and comfort were the source of inspiration for the light and airy apartments. All of which have been carefully designed to make guests feel completely at home. As well as having all the sun, sand and deep blue Mediterranean Sea required for a relaxing summer getaway, the resort also boasts numerous facilities including an outdoor pool, a Jacuzzi and a childrenâs play area. For active types there is also a fully-equipped fitness centre with a cardiovascular machine room. With tropical gardens on all the terraces and communal areas, the resort provides a picturesque and tranquil environment, perfect for soaking up the Spanish sun. In the evenings the many restaurants in the nearby Puerto Banus are an ideal choice for sampling some fine, local cuisine. Alternatively guests can visit Marbella for its lively nightlife and scores of restaurants and bars, all offering a wide variety of local and international cuisine. Apartments in the resort have been carefully designed to meet all guestsâ requirements to guarantee a pleasant and enjoyable stay. The 1-Bedroom apartments offer a spacious 85sqm and feature private bathrooms complete with a hydro-massage bath and power shower, comfortable terraces with pool and garden views and a fully-equipped kitchen. For guests with their own transport, there is also one parking space per apartment.
